definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: perplex, confuse (? Ar. ba0ka stir up (water of spring) then be disturbed, confused; cf. As. bâku, lead captive, orig. lead astray? COT Ezr 4:2)—only

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נׇב֫וֹכָה]] Es 3:15; 3 mpl. [[נׇבׂ֫כוּ]] Joe 1:18; Pt. pl. [[נְבֻכִים]] Ex 14:3; —be confused, in confusion (of a city) Es 3:15; = wander aimlessly (of Isr.) Ex 14:3; so of cattle Joe 1:18 (Merx prop. [[בָּכוּ]], after LXX e)/klausan, but [[בכה]] not elsewhere of cattle).
